author: vors
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [ ] Resolves issue #xyz.
- [x] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [x] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->

The best way to sync a branch for our purposes is to rebase
on origin/master
title: Simplify update sync local repo workflow in powershell-repository-101.md
